text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly discusses the risk of recharacterizing intercompany debt as equity under Section 385, noting that this conversion would result in the interest payments being treated as dividends, which destroys the deductibility at the Luxembourg level and eliminates the treaty benefits associated with interest payments.
